BETNUMBERS_PLACED.v1: £{BetAmount} bet on {Numbers}. Place another bet or say spin the wheel.
BETNUMBERS_PLACED.v2: I got you down for £{BetAmount} on {Numbers}. Say spin or place another bet.
BETNUMBERS_PLACED.v3: Let's put £{BetAmount} on {Numbers} for you. Say spin or place another bet.
BETNUMBERS_PLACED.v4: OK <break time="200ms"/> you have £{BetAmount} on {Numbers}. Place another bet or say spin.

BETNUMBERS_PLACED_DUPLICATE.v1: Adding £{NewBetAmount} to your existing bet for a total of £{BetAmount} bet on {Numbers}. Place another bet or say spin the wheel to spin.
BETNUMBERS_PLACED_DUPLICATE.v2: I've got another £{NewBetAmount} on {Numbers} for a total of £{BetAmount}. Say spin or place another bet.
BETNUMBERS_PLACED_DUPLICATE.v3: OK <break time="200ms"/> £{NewBetAmount} more on {Numbers} makes a total of £{BetAmount}. Say spin or place another bet.

BETBLACK_PLACED.v4: OK <break time="200ms"/> you have £{BetAmount} on black. Place another bet or say spin.

BETRED_PLACED.v4: OK <break time="200ms"/> you have £{BetAmount} on red. Place another bet or say spin.

BETLOW_PLACED.v1: £{BetAmount} bet on low numbers <amazon:effect name="whispered"> that's 1 thru 18</amazon:effect> <break time="200ms"/> Place another bet or say spin the wheel.

BETLOW_PLACED.v3: Let's put £{BetAmount} on low numbers for you. Say spin or place another bet.

BETHIGH_PLACED.v1: £{BetAmount} bet on high numbers <amazon:effect name="whispered"> that's 19 thru 36</amazon:effect> <break time="200ms"/> Place another bet or say spin the wheel.

LAUNCH_WELCOME_BUSTED.v1: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> {TournamentResult} {Greeting} Welcome to Roulette Wheel. Looks like you ran out of money <amazon:effect name="whispered"> <break time="200ms"/> but don't worry, I'll reset your bankroll to £1000.</amazon:effect> You can place a bet such as {Suggestion}.
LAUNCH_WELCOME_BUSTED.v2: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> {TournamentResult} {Greeting} Let's play some Roulette Wheel. Oops! LAUNCH_WELCOME_BUSTED_BUTTON.v1: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> {TournamentResult} {Greeting} Welcome to Roulette Wheel. Looks like you ran out of money <amazon:effect name="whispered"> <break time="200ms"/> but don't worry, I'll reset your bankroll to £1000.</amazon:effect> You can place a bet such as {Suggestion} <break time="200ms"/> or if you have an Echo Button you can press it to spin the wheel.
LAUNCH_WELCOME_BUSTED_BUTTON.v2: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> {TournamentResult} {Greeting} Let's play some Roulette Wheel. LAUNCH_WELCOME_BUSTED_BUTTON.v3: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> {TournamentResult} {Greeting} Time to play to Roulette Wheel. Looks like you ran out of money <amazon:effect name="whispered"> <break time="200ms"/> but don't worry, I'll reset your bankroll to £1000.</amazon:effect> We allow bets like {Suggestion} <break time="300ms"/> If you have an Echo Button it can be used to spin the wheel.

SPIN_WINNER: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Your bets on {WinBet} won leaving you with £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_PUSH: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won your bets on {WinBet} but broken even overall <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_LOSE: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won your bets on {WinBet} but you lost overall bring you down to £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_LOSE_ALL: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Tough break, all of your best lost leaving you at £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_ONEBET_WINNER: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won bringing you to £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_ONEBET_LOSE_ALL: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Sorry, you lost leaving you at £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_LOSE_ALL_BUSTED: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Tough break, all your bets lost leaving you with no money. Resetting to £1000 and clearing your bets. {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_ONEBET_LOSE_ALL_BUSTED: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Tough break, you lost all your money. Resetting to £1000 and clearing your bets. {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_LOSE_BANKROLL_TOOSMALL_FORLASTBETS: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won your bets on {WinBet} but you lost overall. Your bankroll of £{Bankroll} isn't enough to place these bets again. Clearing your bets. {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_LOSE_ALL_BANKROLL_TOOSMALL_FORLASTB: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You lost all your bets and now your bankroll of £{Bankroll} isn't enough to place these bets again. Clearing your bets. {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_ONEBET_LOSE_ALL_BANKROLL_TOOSMALL_F: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> Sorry you lost and your bankroll of £{Bankroll} isn't enough to place this bet again. Clearing your bets. {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?
HELP_WHEEL_AMERICAN_WITHBETS: Playing with a double zero American wheel. You have £{Bankroll} {Achievements, plural, =0 {} 1 {and 1 achievement point} other {and # achievement points}} <break time="200ms"/> Say spin the wheel to play your bets or read high scores to hear the leader board. Check the Alexa companion app for a full set of additional bets you can place. You earn 100 achievement points for every tournament win <break time='200ms'/> 10 points each day you play <break time='200ms'/> and an exponential 2 to the N points for each streak of the same number coming up N times in a row. CANCEL_REMOVE_BET_WITHBET: Removing your bet of £{Amount} on {Bet}. Place a bet or say spin to spin the wheel.
CANCEL_REMOVE_BET_NOBET: Removing your bet of £{Amount} on {Bet}. Place a bet.
REPEAT_BETS: You have £{Bankroll} with bets of {Bets}. What else can I help you with?
REPEAT_LAST_BETS: You have £{Bankroll} <break time="200ms"/> Your last bets were {Bets} <break time="200ms"/> Say bet to replace these with a new set of bets or spin to reuse these bets. What else can I help you with?
REPEAT_PLACE_BETS: You have £{Bankroll} and no bets on the wheel. What else can I help you with?
SPIN_CANTBET_LASTBETS: Sorry, your bankroll of £{Bankroll} can't support your last set of bets.
LEADER_TOURNAMENT_RANKING: Your bankroll of £{Bankroll} ranks you as <say-as interpret-as="ordinal">{Position}</say-as> of {Players} players in the tournament.
TOURNAMENT_HELP_WITHBETS: You are playing in the Roulette Wheel tournament. You have £{Bankroll} and {Spins} spins remaining. {Standing}. Say spin the wheel to play your bets or read high scores to hear the leader board. Check the Alexa companion app for a full set of additional bets you can place. What else can I help you with?
TOURNAMENT_HELP_LASTBETS: You are playing in the Roulette Wheel tournament. You have £{Bankroll} and {Spins} spins remaining. {Standing}. Say spin the wheel to play the same bets from last time or read high scores to hear the leader board. Check the Alexa companion app for a full set of new bets you can place. What else can I help you with?
TOURNAMENT_WELCOME_NEWPLAYER: Welcome to the Roulette Tournament! You start the tournament with £{Amount} and have {Spins} spins to earn as high a bankroll as possible. At the end of the tournament, the highest bankroll will receive 100 achievement points. Note that this tournament is separate from your normal bankroll.
TOURNAMENT_WINNER: Congratulations, you won the tournament with £{Amount}!
TOURNAMENT_LOSER: Sorry, you didn't win the tournament. The high score was £{HighScore} and you had £{Amount}.
